original: @147b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @147b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya aashta ma h'a bha ya tra ya t'a r'a ya s'a dha nam /
analyzed: a'arya aashta ma h'a bha ya tra ya t'a r'a ya s'a dha nam /
translated: Arya-ashtamahabhayatratayatarasadhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs//
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs//
translated: The sādhana of Tārā, the protector from the eight great fears

original: @148a * // 'phags ma 'jigs pa chen po brgyad skyob ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @148a * // 'phags ma 'jigs pa chen po brgyad skyob ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble one who protects from the eight great fears!

original: gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: Merely by remembering her,

original: 'jigs chen brgyad ni rab 'joms ma //
analyzed: 'jigs chen brgyad ni rab 'joms ma //
translated: she thoroughly destroys the eight great fears.

original: de la phyag 'tshal sgrub pa'i thabs //
analyzed: de la phyag 'tshal sgrub pa'i thabs //
translated: Having paid homage to her,

original: rab tu bshad bya byas rnams nyon //
analyzed: rab tu bshad bya byas rnams nyon //
translated: I will explain the sādhana. Listen!

original: sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad skyob ma //
analyzed: sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad skyob ma //
translated: Meditate on Tārā, the protector from the eight fears,

original: nam mkha'i dbus su bsgom bar bya //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbus su bsgom bar bya //
translated: in the center of space.

original: yid kyis rang gis mchod byas nas //
analyzed: yid kyis rang gis mchod byas nas //
translated: Having mentally made offerings to her,

original: sdig pa rnams ni bshags par bya //🔽bsod nams la ni rjes yid rang //
analyzed: sdig pa rnams ni bshags par bya // bsod nams la ni rjes yid rang //
translated: confess your misdeeds.🔽Rejoice in merits,🔽and then gather your own merits.🔽Therefore, offer yourself

original: phyi nas bdag gi bsod nams bsag / de phyir bdag nyid dbul ba dang // gsum la yang ni skyabs su 'gro //
analyzed: phyi nas bdag gi bsod nams bsag / de phyir bdag nyid dbul ba dang // gsum la yang ni skyabs su 'gro //
translated: and go for refuge to the Three.

original: bya ba byas pa'i phyi nas ni //
analyzed: bya ba byas pa'i phyi nas ni //
translated: After that,

original: gang las stong nyid mtha' ru ni//
analyzed: gang las stong nyid mtha' ru ni//
translated: From which emptiness is at the end,

original: rang gi snying gar zla de'i gnas //
analyzed: rang gi snying gar zla de'i gnas //
translated: in one’s heart, in the place of the moon,

original: padma 'dab brgyad rnam par rgyas //
analyzed: padma 'dab brgyad rnam par rgyas //
translated: a fully blossomed eight-petaled lotus,

original: de yi dbus su t'am yig bsam //
analyzed: de yi dbus su t'am yig bsam //
translated: in its center one should think of the syllable tāṃ.

original: de bzhin autpal sngon po la //
analyzed: de bzhin autpal sngon po la //
translated: Likewise, on a blue lotus,

original: de yi dbus su 'ang sa bon las //
analyzed: de yi dbus su 'ang sa bon las //
translated: in its center, from the seed syllable,

original: me yi 'od zer rab tu gsal //
analyzed: me yi 'od zer rab tu gsal //
translated: the light rays of fire are very bright.

original: de yis lha mo yang dag bskyed //
analyzed: de yis lha mo yang dag bskyed //
translated: By that, the goddess is perfectly generated,

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with all the ornaments,🔽the goddess’s right hand in the boon-granting gesture,

original: lha mo'i phyag g-yas mchog sbyin dang // g-yon na de bzhin autpal bsnams //
analyzed: lha mo'i phyag g-yas mchog sbyin dang // g-yon na de bzhin autpal bsnams //
translated: and in the left likewise holding a blue lotus.

original: gzugs mdzes zhal ni gcig ma ste //
analyzed: gzugs mdzes zhal ni gcig ma ste //
translated: She is beautiful, with one face,

original: na tshod gzhon nus yang dag gnas //
analyzed: na tshod gzhon nus yang dag gnas //
translated: and abides in the prime of youth.

original: me tog dri bzangs dbu skra brgyan //
analyzed: me tog dri bzangs dbu skra brgyan //
translated: Her hair is adorned with flower garlands and good scents,

original: padma dang ni zla ba'i steng //
analyzed: padma dang ni zla ba'i steng //
translated: on a lotus and moon.

original: skyil krung phyed pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs //🔽sa gsum 'jigs pa brgyad skyob pa'i //
analyzed: skyil krung phyed pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs // sa gsum 'jigs pa brgyad skyob pa'i //
translated: She sits in the half-lotus posture,

original: lha mo brgyad po'i bar du ni //
analyzed: lha mo brgyad po'i bar du ni //
translated: in the midst of the eight goddesses who protect the three worlds from the eight fears.

original: sgrol ma'i sku ru bsgom par bya //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i sku ru bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on the form of Tārā.

original: rnal 'byor pa ni de sngags spro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni de sngags spro //
translated: The yogin should emanate the mantra.

original: yid la zhu bar bsam par bya //🔽aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a //
analyzed: yid la zhu bar bsam par bya // aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a //
translated: and think that they dissolve into your mind.🔽Om tare tuttare ture svâhâ.

original: aom aom sv'a h'a shar du'o //🔽aom t'a sv'a h'a lho ru'o //
analyzed: aom aom sv'a h'a shar du'o // aom t'a sv'a h'a lho ru'o //
translated: Om om svâhâ in the east.🔽Om tâ svâhâ in the south.

original: aom re sv'a h'a nub tu'o //🔽aom tu sv'a h'a byang du'o //
analyzed: aom re sv'a h'a nub tu'o // aom tu sv'a h'a byang du'o //
translated: Om re svâhâ in the west.🔽Om ture svâhâ in the north.

original: aom tt'a sv'a h'a me'i mtshams su'o //
analyzed: aom tt'a sv'a h'a me'i mtshams su'o //
translated: Om tta svâhâ in the southeast.

original: aom re sv'a h'a bden bral du'o //🔽aom tu sv'a h'a rlung du'o ;
analyzed: aom re sv'a h'a bden bral du'o // aom tu sv'a h'a rlung du'o ;
translated: Om re svâhâ in the southwest.🔽Om ture svâhâ in the northwest.

original: / aom re sv'a h'a dbang ldan du'o //
analyzed: / aom re sv'a h'a dbang ldan du'o //
translated: Om svâhâ in the northeast.

original: de thams cad kyang 'od zer 'phro ba'i gzugs can lha mo ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan rnams so //
analyzed: de thams cad kyang 'od zer 'phro ba'i gzugs can lha mo ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan rnams so //
translated: All of them have the form of radiating light, and are like the Goddess.

original: aom t'a re n+yee badzra pushpa pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom t'a re n+yee badzra pushpa pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: Om târe nyâya vajra-puspa pratîccha svâhâ.

original: zhes pas me tog dbul zhing /
analyzed: zhes pas me tog dbul zhing /
translated: With this, offer the flowers.

original: de bzhin du dri la sogs pa autpa la'i phyag rgyas dbul bar bya'o zhes so //🔽lha mo dgu dang ldan pa yi //
analyzed: de bzhin du dri la sogs pa autpa la'i phyag rgyas dbul bar bya'o zhes so // lha mo dgu dang ldan pa yi //
translated: In the same way, offer scents and so forth with the utpala gesture.

original: de bzhin sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
analyzed: de bzhin sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
translated: This method, endowed with the nine Goddesses,

original: 'jigs pa brgyad po bcom gyur nas //
analyzed: 'jigs pa brgyad po bcom gyur nas //
translated: having conquered the eight fears,

original: 'gro kun bla med byed par shog /'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'gro kun bla med byed par shog /'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The sādhana of Tārā, who protects from the eight great fears, is complete.
